name: THE ESTEE LAUDER COMPANIES INC.
goal: ELC is a global manufacturer of high end cosmetic products. ELC sells its products through selective distribution channels in more than 140 countries, including the EEA Member States.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Environment, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Cosmetic legislation, REACH, Product Safety and Market Surveillance, Access to Genetic Resources and the Fair and Equitable Sharing of Benefits Arising from their Utilization in the Union, Data Protection and e-Privacy, Consumer legislation, Digital Single Market, Circular Economy and Plastic Strategy, Competition, Brexit and Trade.
